DOC.brief_summary: This is a national, multicenter, cross-sectional epidemiological study in adult Spanish participants diagnosed with advanced or metastatic melanoma.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Analyze Mutations in V600 BRAF Oncogen in Participants With Metastatic Melanoma
DOC.criteria: Valid tumor samples from participants diagnosed with Stage IIIc or IV melanoma Written informed consent granted Do not fulfill one or more inclusion criteria
